name: Smartphone
description: Latest smartphone with high-resolution camera, fast processor, and long battery life. Perfect for photography enthusiasts and power users.

name: Laptop
description: Lightweight laptop with powerful performance, bright display, and excellent battery life. Ideal for work and entertainment.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality and comfort for all-day listening.

name: Smart Watch
description: Feature-packed smartwatch with health tracking, notifications, and water resistance. Stay connected and monitor your fitness goals.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with incredible sound, waterproof design, and long battery life. Perfect for parties and outdoor activities.
